issue.subject: Change PROXY servlet name and web.xml
issue.description:
As suggested here #399, and if PSC validate this change, we should to adapt the servlet name to get uniformized EasySDI names.
current name : proxy
new name : sdi_proxy
New web.xml would be adapted as well (see #399)

journals.notes:
Accepted according to #399.

Target version could be possibly  2.2.0 ?
I let you see according to ongoing tasks...

Any news on this issue ?

(done with PUBLISH #427 and SHOP #428 servlets so far... still needs to be done for MONITOR #426)

You was faster than us to upgrade some components...
For now we haven't worked on such servlet uniformization :-(
This does not apply to current versions [4+] (name is correct, and version is set at build time)
